question.text: Once the next {Throw-in} occurs, keep following the same team and reply exactly 'Trigger: {Throw-in} by left/right'; then for each {Shots on target, Corner and Shots off target} reply 'Then: <Event> by left/right'.

answer.text: Then: Shots on target by left
Then: Shots off target by left
Then: Shots off target by left
